heroSection.title: Loving Life Lately
heroSection.text: It makes no sense that a college dropout from Spokane, Washington could end up as a Senior Software Engineer for Meta working in Generative Ai. It makes even less sense for that person to do creative consultation for some of the biggest names in entertainment. And yet - here I am enjoying the ride, taking it one day at a time.

playgroundPage.title: Playground
playgroundPage.introText: Welcome to the Playground! Explore a variety of UI components and front-end features.

sections.content: This section showcases different styles and behaviors of buttons.
Explore various dynamic UI elements like sliders, toggles, and more.

buttonsCard.title: Interactive Buttons
buttonsCard.description: Explore a variety of button styles and behaviors, from flat to gradient, with interactive hover and click effects.
